channel.title: Al Kharid update and New Quests
channel.description:
I logged out in Al Kharid (in an attempt to get stuck in a rock :P) and I have to say... I am very impressed! Discuss.
One thing that impressed me a lot about Al Kharid is the fact that there is now background music to make the city sound busy! I'm going to try and do the new quests.

item.title: Al Kharid update and New Quests
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

I dislike when quests are just puzzles with poor story/reason behind it - Myths of the white lands, for example.

Read full topic
item.source: Al Kharid update and New Quests

item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

I hope every quest is like this from now on.

Read full topic
item.source: Al Kharid update and New Quests

item.title: Al Kharid update and New Quests
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Personally I like puzzles that are challenging but also don’t take ages to do (EW puzzles were too long, for example). I don’t really care how many, just don’t want them to take forever I really liked the second quest, just because the voice acting and cutscenes were really cool, and it added on to the desert lore.

Read full topic
item.source: Al Kharid update and New Quests

item.title: Al Kharid update and New Quests
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

I wish all quests were like the newest two
Not too many puzzles but also not too little. I hate quests that have loads of puzzles but a weak story - this had the right mix.

Read full topic

item.title: Al Kharid update and New Quests
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

I hear the bot update wasn’t 100% successful

It was, people are just unintelligent. They think that no bots in Botany Bay = Botany Bay doesn’t work. Whereas it actually means there are no bots

Read full topic

item.source: Al Kharid update and New Quests

item.title: Al Kharid update and New Quests
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Don’t expect a lot in Botany Bay for now. Optimus is going to break a lot of the existing injection bots, so the number of active pots is going to drop like crazy. I’ve only seen one bot in the last twenty minutes and that was in world 2. Patience is key here. We don’t want to see a lot of bots in Botany Bay, because that will mean Optimus is working.

Read full topic
item.source: Al Kharid update and New Quests

item.title: Al Kharid update and New Quests

item.description:
